about_the_game:
Some of us will hold the door for you, so you may walk gracefully into the light.

Others will choose to push you in, even if you are not prepared for what you might see.

Inspired by classic RPG MAKER horror games of yesteryear, Jackie: Descend Into Madness follows the titular Jackie, a quiet rabbit that has found herself in an unfamiliar world of strange environments, otherworldly inhabitants, and a looming fear that something is very, very wrong. Explore unique worlds, hundreds of hidden secrets. And a dark truth that awaits you at the bottom. When you learn the truth of this world, will you be able to look at it the same again?

Game Features

  • Nine unique worlds, each bigger than the last.

  • Vast amounts of collectable items and cutscenes to flesh out the world of Jackie: Descend into Madness.

  • Terrifying pixel art and animation.

  • A tense soundtrack featuring many genres.

  • Divine retribution.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains depictions of murder, self-harm,
suicide, themes of religion, and other intense 
themes and imagery that some may find disturbing.

It also contains flashing lights and animation that
could cause discomfort and/or seizure to
those with photosensitivity.

name: Jackie: Descend Into Madness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Play as Jackie, a lost rabbit, as you descend deeper into a strange world with even stranger sights. Uncover your dark past and traverse a land of endless joys and sorrows.
